query:
UPDATE workspace_settings SET
             auto_invite = jsonb_set(
                 jsonb_set(
                     auto_invite,
                     '{instance_groups}',
                     (SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(elem), '[]'::jsonb) FROM jsonb_array_elements(auto_invite->'instance_groups') elem WHERE elem #>> '{}' != $1)
                 ),
                 '{instance_groups_roles}',
                 COALESCE(auto_invite->'instance_groups_roles', '{}'::jsonb) - $1
             )
             WHERE workspace_id = $2
